part1000.publication_index.name: CR_designAPs_1
part1000.publication_index.wg.number.publication_set_comments: intermediate design AP modules change request
part1000.publication_index.description: The modules added to Part1000 as part of change request CR_designAPs_1 to validate intermediately design AP modules including their long forms schema. CR_designAPs_2 is planned with an extended scope. The STEPmod CVS repository should be tagged as: CR_designAPs_1 before submitting the change request.
